mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(PRODUCT_ID, PNAME, UNIT_PRICE, DESCRIPTION, MANUFACTURER, CATEGORY, UNITS_IN_STOCK, CONDITION) VALUES(#{productId},#{pname},#{unitPrice},#{description},#{manufacturer},#{category},#{unitsInStock},#{condition})
mapper.select:
SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PNAME, UNIT_PRICE, DESCRIPTION, MANUFACTURER, CATEGORY, UNITS_IN_STOCK, CONDITION, FILENAME FROM PRODUCT WHERE 1 = 1
AND (PNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%' OR CATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%')
ORDER BY PNAME DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART(CART_ID, NAME, SHIPPING_DATE, ADDRESS_NAME, ADDRESS_DETAIL, REGIST_DT, COUNTRY, ZIP_CODE) VALUES(#{cartId},#{name},#{shippingDate},#{addressName},#{addressDetail},sysdate,#{country},#{zipCode})
